extendedInfo.description: Rattles, pictures, lullabies, sounds, toy piano for your newborn!This is the unique and babysitting application for the very little children (infants). It will help you to calm, carry away your kid while it is necessary for you: in the car, in turn for a doctor, at your home, for example, during massage and other procedures. In this author's application the development features of the newborn children are considered, all images and sounds can be used from 10th day of life. The black-and-white drawing stimulates visual skills development, quiet and pleasant children's music stimulates hearing development The Â«Happy newbornÂ» application contains following sections: 1) Black-and-white cards. The simplest ornaments for kiddies with lullaby. 2) Black-and-white cards. Animals for baby with music. 3) Black-and-white cards. Subjects for baby with sounds. 4) Rattle toy. 5) Roly-poly doll toys. 6) Musical xylophone (toy piano) and lullabies (music for newborn). 7) Manual for parents. 8) Detailed information on development of visual skills from birth to half a year. This is not simply a pad for kiddies, but also the excellent application for moms and daddies, who do not know how to calm Ð° child at once. Device: only for tablets!Age limits: Since the birth (after 10th day of life) of your child till 1,5 year. We wish to congratulate you on birth of your kid! Youâve got a wonderful newborn, it will surely make well with your help. The author of the application, mom of two small children, hopes that it will be useful to your kid and will help you to interest and calm it when it is necessary for you. Black-and-white pictures. Slide show (mult). Visual skills of your kid are strongly limited after birth. Sight of little children only starts to develop, it sees only at a short distance and is more susceptible to contrast colors. The childâs eyes work in a black-and-white mode during this period, other colors are interpreted as shades of the grey. Interest in contrast colors lays a way for the further development of the kidâs brain. It is the period of the visual system development most optimal and sensitive to external stimulation.The application contains three sections with 2 image demonstration modes - manual paging and auto paging with music (cartoon). Simple and bright toys for your infant.Rattle (toys) â is the most favorite and important toy for the kid younger one year. The musical xylophone (toy piano) with pure sounds and bright buttons affects on sight and hearing development of your child. The section contains 5 notes and 5 children's melodies (lullaby) which you can switch on for the child, because you know that music for babies is not less important, than competently collected images for sight development. Roly-poly doll attracts with color brightness, develops hearing, imagination, color perception, coordination of movements, ability of logically thinking and communications establishing. It takes only to drop this toy as it independently accepts standing position at once. Our roly-poly is very simple, and it is impossible to take it in hands, but it has the similar principle of action. Dear parents! If you see, that the application works incorrectly, we ask you to send a response with the problem description to childrensminds@gmail.com. It will help us to make better the application. Thanks!
